name: Better to Upload
description:
Description

What if you had a huge fan base that loved you?  What if your content is what kept them alive? What if you stopped making content and took a break from them? What if you never came back? What if no medicine in the world can cure the ones you hurt? What if their world became so red they decided to get revenge? What if they decided to return the pain? What if it was simply Better to Upload? Maybe it would have been... Now you have a chance. There is still someone on your side to protect you. But they can always turn against you too. Don't let the red get you. Don't let him catch you. If you do... All I can tell you is that it is Better to Upload...

Story

You're a content creator who hasn't uploaded in three years. Don't make the same mistake. You started this and they won't stop until you die. Warning this game is not intended for kids and is very scary. It is also still in development and is only a small portion of what you can expect when the full game releases. 

Disclaimer

This demo contains frightening scenes, loud noises, and flashing lights. This is still a work in progress build and is in early stages of development. Feedback is always appreciated. This game is a horror game. You might get scared here and there. 

Controls

Use the WASD keys to move (In-Game and outside) Use space to interact, to Enter the game and to resume dialogue. Use Q to look to your right. Use F to toggle Flashlight. Use Enter to enter the monitor (In the Game).
